SEARCH
Package entityClasses

Class PostList

java.lang.Object
entityClasses.PostList
public class PostList extends Object

Title: PostList Class

Description: Collection manager for Post objects with filtering, sorting, and search capabilities. Returns new PostList instances for immutability.

User Stories Supported: - #3: Filter posts by thread - #4: Search posts by keywords - #5: Sort posts by date (newest/oldest) - #6: Filter out deleted posts - #8: View posts by specific author

      Returns:
      true if removed

      Returns:
      Post with matching ID, or null if not found

      Returns:

      public void clear()
      Removes all posts from collection.

    • filterByThread

      public PostList filterByThread(String thread)
      Filters posts by thread category. User Story #3: Filter posts by thread
      Parameters:
      thread - Thread name to filter by (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      New PostList with only matching posts

    • filterByAuthor

      PostList filterByAuthor(String author)
      Filters posts by author. User Story #8: View own posts
      Parameters:
      author - Username to filter by (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      New PostList with only posts by this author

    • filterActive

      public PostList filterActive()
      Filters out deleted posts (soft delete pattern). User Story #6: See only active posts
      Returns:
      New PostList with only non-deleted posts

    • searchByKeywords

      public PostList searchByKeywords(String searchText)
      Searches posts by keywords (all keywords must match). User Story #4: Search posts by keywords
      Parameters:
      searchText - Space-separated keywords (empty returns all)
      Returns:
      New PostList with matching posts

    • filterByThreadAndSearch

      public PostList filterByThreadAndSearch(String thread, String searchText)
      Combined filter: thread + keyword search. User Stories #3 and #4 combined
      Parameters:
      thread - Thread to filter by ("All" or null for all threads)
      searchText - Keywords to search (empty for no search)
      Returns:
      New PostList with both filters applied

    • sortByNewest

      public PostList sortByNewest()
      Sorts posts by date, newest first. User Story #5: Sort posts by date
      Returns:
      New PostList sorted by timestamp descending

    • sortByOldest

      public PostList sortByOldest()
      Sorts posts by date, oldest first. User Story #5: Sort posts by date
      Returns:
      New PostList sorted by timestamp ascending
